data.title: Training Suite
data.meta_description: Located on the 4th floor, this large L-shaped multi-purpose room accommodates up to 30 with desk seating. It features ample space for coffee or lunch service from the kitchen area, and a separate board room (for 16) and private offices that make for convenient breakout rooms or staging areas. Mobile monitors can be added upon …
data.text:
Overlooking the Soldiers and Sailors Monument, this Egyptian-inspired art deco gem, with its distinctive ziggurat crown and bronze grilles with hieroglyphic details, was completed in 1930 and is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. With retail wrapping around the ground floor level, its 14 floors delight inhabitants and visitors alike by blending modernized interiors with beautifully maintained art deco details.

Access: The building’s proximity to Washington Street, I-65, I-70, and multiple local bus lines allows commuters easy access in and out of the city.
